author: Saberin C
description:
Known widely for her YA series Legend and The Young Elites series, NYT #1 bestselling author Marie Lu sat down with us at Grimdark to discuss her debut adult fantasy Red City. Red City has quickly become one of my favourite reads of the year, and I’m ever impressed at how much space it’s taken up in my brain. I am ecstatic […]

The post INTERVIEW: with author Marie Lu appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: INTERVIEW: with author Marie Lu
